sentences.sContent: His voice dropped at the end of the sentence.
sentences.sCn: 到句子结尾处，他压低了嗓音。

trans.tranCn: [语][计] 句子，命题；宣判，判决
trans.tranOther: a group of words that usually contains a subject and a verb, and expresses a complete idea. Sentences written in English begin with a capital letter and usually end with a  full stop  or a  question mark
if a judge sentences someone who is guilty of a crime, they give them a punishment
